code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../styles/countdown.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Countdown=_ref=>{let{targetDate}=_ref;const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState({days:0,hours:0,minutes:0,seconds:0});useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{const now=new Date().getTime();const target=new Date(targetDate).getTime();const distance=target-now;setTimeLeft({days:Math.floor(distance/(1000*60*60*24)),hours:Math.floor(distance%(1000*60*60*24)/(1000*60*60)),minutes:Math.floor(distance%(1000*60*60)/(1000*60)),seconds:Math.floor(distance%(1000*60)/1000)});},1000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[targetDate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-number",children:timeLeft.days}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-label",children:"Dias"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-number",children:timeLeft.hours}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-label",children:"Horas"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-number",children:timeLeft.minutes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-label",children:"Minutos"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-number",children:timeLeft.seconds}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"countdown-label",children:"Segundos"})]})]});};export default Countdown;
